page.title: 20Changes in Waltham St L.
page.content:
There is change taking place all the time in the villages, houses are being extended or demolished, shops are closing or changing use and people are moving into and out of the area.
The traditional village population is changing as the very high price of property is forcing local people to move away to make room for wealthy commuters. Farming methods mean fewer and fewer men work on the land as machines take over.
The area is now{Green Belt}so there will be very little new building to change the rural character of the area.
Compiled by the children and staff of Waltham St Lawrence School under the direction of Mr D Griffiths.
